headlines.description: Manchester United were easily beaten at Old Trafford in the local derby as Manchester City ran out 2-0 winners on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd well-beaten in home derby vs. Man City

headlines.description: Mathias Normann scored a brilliant solo goal and Teemu Pukki netted a first-half penalty as struggling Norwich City beat Brentford 2-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Norwich beat Brentford for first Prem win of year

headlines.description: A 79th minute header from Burnley's Matej Vydra shocked Premier League leaders Chelsea at Stamford Bridge on Saturday as the sides drew 1-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley nick late draw vs. Chelsea

headlines.description: Crystal Palace claimed a second successive Premier League victory and extended their unbeaten run to six games with a win over Wolves.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace into Prem top half with win over Wolves

events.name: Newcastle United at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: — Isaac Hayden’s equalizer gave relegation-threatened Newcastle a 1-1 draw at Brighton in front of prospective new manager Eddie Howe in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle draws 1-1 with Brighton in front of Eddie Howe
